extendedInfo.description: Traveling to new destination is always fun, however it covers at the cost of uncertainty.  In such situation, Eyewatch comes handy for you to stay connected to your loved ones and travel without tension. Get Eyewatch and enjoy hassle free travelling.In the changing world of Mobile Phone Applications, Do we have a possibility to have a system based on mobile phones that can help in emergency situations and thus reducing the response time ?? YES we do !!!Eyewatch is an easy-to-use application for your personal safety, which gets installed on your mobile and allows you to trigger instant emergency alerts to your trusted contacts, alerting them of your emergency along with your location, audio visuals of the situation and other critical details.-Immediately captures audio-visual information of situation to share with your emergency contacts.-Tracks location using GPS & Network Triangulation.-Alert your loved ones without drawing anyone's attention.-Alert data stored on a secure cloud server.-Sends sos alert even if not connected to GPRS.-Safety confirm - upon click guardians get a message with location.Eyewatch can help in situations like:â¢	Insecurity in lonely placesâ¢	Medical emergenciesâ¢	Travel emergenciesâ¢	Raggingâ¢	Women Safetyâ¢	Road Rageâ¢	Stuck in a liftâ¢	Lost in a new cityâ¢	Concern about loved ones when they travelâ¢	Personal security threatWho is Eyewatch for?â¢	Working Professionalsâ¢	Single Womenâ¢	Worried Parentsâ¢	Kidsâ¢	College Studentsâ¢	Senior CitizensFor more information on Eyewatch, visit www.eye-watch.in
